title: Golf Cart Keys
summaries: The Golf Cart Keys are a mount-summoning item that places the player in a rideable Golf Cart. They are purchased from the Golfer for 50 after Skeletron has been defeated, and a golf score of 2000 is earned by the player.
The Golf Cart emits light from its front that reaches about 40 tiles, with the brightest point being at about 15 tiles.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a rideable Golf Cart mount
statistics.Buy: 50
statistics.Sell: 10
